Content:
I downloaded Linux.zip and replaced my komodod ,komodo-cli and zmigrate.  Trying to start komodod:
./komodod: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcurl.so.4: version `CURL_OPENSSL_4' not found (required by ./komodod)
./komodod: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.11' not found (required by ./komodod)
./komodod: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.22' not found (required by ./komodod)

Author: KNOX#9338
Content: use `sudo apt-get install libcurl4` and try again

Author: KNOX#9338
Content: i followed official instructions to build this Linux version. maybe try your locally compiled linux binaries for testing on Linux
